attributes.action: Ensure that the provision of healthcare in the United Kingdom is given with priority to citizens who have a current National Insurance number.  Care to those without a National Insurance number should be given only where treatment is not being withheld by the Trust due to insufficient funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where healthcare is restricted due to insufficient funds, those who have contributed to the system should have first call on the available medical care.  We should still offer care to all; but those who paid into the fund have a right to be treated ahead of those who paid nothing or very little.
